mapper.insert: insert into qt_finacial_authentication_base (user_id, education, marriage, children, province_id, city_id, domain, qq, email) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{education,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{marriage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{children,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{provinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{domain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select user_id, education, marriage, children, province_id, city_id, domain, qq, email from qt_finacial_authentication_base
select user_id, education, marriage, children, province_id, city_id, domain, qq, email from qt_finacial_authentication_base where user_id = #{_parameter}
mapper.update: update qt_finacial_authentication_base set education =#{education,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, marriage = #{marriage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, children =#{children,jdbcType=INTEGER}, province_id = #{provinceId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, city_id = #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, domain = #{domain,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qq = #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
